card.name: Accumulated Knowledge
card.text: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Accumulated Knowledge in all graveyards.

card.name: AEther Barrier
card.text: Whenever a player casts a creature spell, that player sacrifices a permanent unless he or she pays {1}.

card.name: Air Bladder
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. Enchanted creature can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Ancient Hydra
card.text: Fading 5 {1}, Remove a fade counter from Ancient Hydra: Ancient Hydra deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Angelic Favor
card.text: If you control a Plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control rather than pay Angelic Favor's mana cost. Cast Angelic Favor only during combat. Put a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying onto the battlefield. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Animate Land
card.text: Until end of turn, target land becomes a 3/3 creature that's still a land.

card.name: Arc Mage
card.text: {2}{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Arc Mage deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players.

card.name: Ascendant Evincar
card.text: Flying Other black creatures get +1/+1. Nonblack creatures get -1/-1.

card.name: Avenger en-Dal
card.text: {2}{W}, {T}, Discard a card: Exile target attacking creature. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.

card.name: Battlefield Percher
card.text: Flying Battlefield Percher can block only creatures with flying. {1}{B}: Battlefield Percher gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Belbe's Armor
card.text: {X}, {T}: Target creature gets -X/+X until end of turn.

card.name: Belbe's Percher
card.text: Flying Belbe's Percher can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Belbe's Portal
card.text: As Belbe's Portal enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. {3}, {T}: You may put a creature card of the chosen type from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Blastoderm
card.text: Shroud Fading 3

card.name: Blinding Angel
card.text: Flying Whenever Blinding Angel deals combat damage to a player, that player skips his or her next combat phase.

card.name: Bola Warrior
card.text: {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature can't block this turn.

card.name: Carrion Wall
card.text: Defender {1}{B}: Regenerate Carrion Wall.

card.name: Chieftain en-Dal
card.text: Whenever Chieftain en-Dal attacks, attacking creatures gain first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Cloudskate
card.text: Flying Fading 3

card.name: Coiling Woodworm
card.text: Coiling Woodworm's power is equal to the number of Forests on the battlefield.

card.name: Complex Automaton
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control seven or more permanents, return Complex Automaton to its owner's hand.

card.name: Dark Triumph
card.text: If you control a Swamp, you may sacrifice a creature rather than pay Dark Triumph's mana cost. Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Daze
card.text: You may return an Island you control to its owner's hand rather than pay Daze's mana cost. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

card.name: Death Pit Offering
card.text: When Death Pit Offering enters the battlefield, sacrifice all creatures you control. Creatures you control get +2/+2.

card.name: Defender en-Vec
card.text: Fading 4 Remove a fade counter from Defender en-Vec: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

card.name: Defiant Falcon
card.text: Flying {4}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Defiant Vanguard
card.text: When Defiant Vanguard blocks, at end of combat, destroy it and all creatures it blocked this turn. {5}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 4 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Divining Witch
card.text: {1}{B}, {T}, Discard a card: Name a card. Exile the top six cards of your library. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal the named card, then put that card into your hand. Exile all other cards revealed this way.

card.name: Dominate
card.text: Gain control of target creature with converted mana cost X or less.

card.name: Downhill Charge
card.text: You may sacrifice a Mountain rather than pay Downhill Charge's mana cost. Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of Mountains you control.

card.name: Ensnare
card.text: You may return two Islands you control to their owner's hand rather than pay Ensnare's mana cost. Tap all creatures.

card.name: Eye of Yawgmoth
card.text: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Reveal a number of cards from the top of your library equal to the sacrificed creature's power. Put one into your hand and exile the rest.

card.name: Fanatical Devotion
card.text: Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate target creature.

card.name: Flame Rift
card.text: Flame Rift deals 4 damage to each player.

card.name: Flint Golem
card.text: Whenever Flint Golem becomes blocked, defending player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Flowstone Armor
card.text: You may choose not to untap Flowstone Armor during your untap step. {3}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/-1 for as long as Flowstone Armor remains tapped.

card.name: Flowstone Crusher
card.text: {R}: Flowstone Crusher gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Flowstone Overseer
card.text: {R}{R}: Target creature gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Flowstone Slide
card.text: All creatures get +X/-X until end of turn.

card.name: Flowstone Strike
card.text: Target creature gets +1/-1 and gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Flowstone Surge
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/-1.

card.name: Flowstone Thopter
card.text: {1}: Flowstone Thopter gets +1/-1 and gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Flowstone Wall
card.text: Defender {R}: Flowstone Wall gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Fog Patch
card.text: Cast Fog Patch only during the declare blockers step. Attacking creatures become blocked.

card.name: Harvest Mage
card.text: {G}, {T}, Discard a card: Until end of turn, if you tap a land for mana, it produces one mana of a color of your choice instead of any other type and amount.

card.name: Infiltrate
card.text: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Jolting Merfolk
card.text: Fading 4 Remove a fade counter from Jolting Merfolk: Tap target creature.

card.name: Kill Switch
card.text: {2}, {T}: Tap all other artifacts. They don't untap during their controllers' untap steps for as long as Kill Switch remains tapped.

card.name: Kor Haven
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}{W}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking creature this turn.

card.name: Laccolith Grunt
card.text: Whenever Laccolith Grunt becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Grunt assigns no combat damage this turn.

card.name: Laccolith Rig
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, the first creature assigns no combat damage this turn.

card.name: Laccolith Titan
card.text: Whenever Laccolith Titan becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Titan assigns no combat damage this turn.

card.name: Laccolith Warrior
card.text: Whenever Laccolith Warrior becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Warrior assigns no combat damage this turn.

card.name: Laccolith Whelp
card.text: Whenever Laccolith Whelp becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Whelp assigns no combat damage this turn.

card.name: Lashknife
card.text: If you control a Plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control rather than pay Lashknife's mana cost. Enchant creature Enchanted creature has first strike.

card.name: Lawbringer
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Lawbringer: Exile target red creature.

card.name: Lightbringer
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Lightbringer: Exile target black creature.

card.name: Lin Sivvi, Defiant Hero
card.text: {X}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost X or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library. {3}: Put target Rebel card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Mana Cache
card.text: At the beginning of each player's end step, put a charge counter on Mana Cache for each untapped land that player controls. Remove a charge counter from Mana Cache: Add {C} to your mana pool. Any player may activate this ability but only during his or her turn before the end step.

card.name: Massacre
card.text: If an opponent controls a Plains and you control a Swamp, you may cast Massacre without paying its mana cost. All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Mind Slash
card.text: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Mind Swords
card.text: If you control a Swamp, you may sacrifice a creature rather than pay Mind Swords's mana cost. Each player exiles two cards from his or her hand.

card.name: Mogg Alarm
card.text: You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay Mogg Alarm's mana cost. Put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Mogg Salvage
card.text: If an opponent controls an Island and you control a Mountain, you may cast Mogg Salvage without paying its mana cost. Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Mogg Toady
card.text: Mogg Toady can't attack unless you control more creatures than defending player. Mogg Toady can't block unless you control more creatures than attacking player.

card.name: Moggcatcher
card.text: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a Goblin permanent card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Mossdog
card.text: Whenever Mossdog becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, put a +1/+1 counter on Mossdog.

card.name: Murderous Betrayal
card.text: {B}{B}, Pay half your life, rounded up: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Nesting Wurm
card.text: Trample When Nesting Wurm enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Nesting Wurm, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Netter en-Dal
card.text: {W}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature can't attack this turn.

card.name: Noble Stand
card.text: Whenever a creature you control blocks, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Off Balance
card.text: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.

card.name: Oracle's Attendants
card.text: {T}: All damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn by a source of your choice is dealt to Oracle's Attendants instead.

card.name: Oraxid
card.text: Protection from red

card.name: Overlaid Terrain
card.text: As Overlaid Terrain enters the battlefield, sacrifice all lands you control. Lands you control have "{T}: Add two mana of any one color to your mana pool."

card.name: Pack Hunt
card.text: Search your library for up to three cards with the same name as target creature, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Pale Moon
card.text: Until end of turn, if a player taps a nonbasic land for mana, it produces colorless mana instead of any other type.

card.name: Parallax Dementia
card.text: Enchant creature Fading 1 Enchanted creature gets +3/+2. When Parallax Dementia leaves the battlefield, destroy enchanted creature. That creature can't be regenerated.

card.name: Parallax Inhibitor
card.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Parallax Inhibitor: Put a fade counter on each permanent with fading you control.

card.name: Parallax Nexus
card.text: Fading 5 Remove a fade counter from Parallax Nexus: Target opponent exiles a card from his or her hand. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. When Parallax Nexus leaves the battlefield, each player returns to his or her hand all cards he or she owns exiled with Parallax Nexus.

card.name: Parallax Tide
card.text: Fading 5 Remove a fade counter from Parallax Tide: Exile target land. When Parallax Tide leaves the battlefield, each player returns to the battlefield all cards he or she owns exiled with Parallax Tide.

card.name: Parallax Wave
card.text: Fading 5 Remove a fade counter from Parallax Wave: Exile target creature. When Parallax Wave leaves the battlefield, each player returns to the battlefield all cards he or she owns exiled with Parallax Wave.

card.name: Predator, Flagship
card.text: {2}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. {5}, {T}: Destroy target creature with flying.

card.name: Rackling
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Rackling deals X damage to that player, where X is 3 minus the number of cards in his or her hand.

card.name: Rathi Assassin
card.text: {1}{B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target tapped nonblack creature. {3}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Rathi Fiend
card.text: When Rathi Fiend enters the battlefield, each player loses 3 life. {3}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Rathi Intimidator
card.text: Fear {2}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 2 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Rath's Edge
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {4}, {T}, Sacrifice a land: Rath's Edge deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.text: If an opponent controls a Swamp and you control a Forest, you may cast Refreshing Rain without paying its mana cost. Target player gains 6 life.

card.name: Rejuvenation Chamber
card.text: Fading 2 {T}: You gain 2 life.

card.name: Reverent Silence
card.text: If you control a Forest, rather than pay Reverent Silence's mana cost, you may have each other player gain 6 life. Destroy all enchantments.

card.name: Rhox
card.text: You may have Rhox assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked. {2}{G}: Regenerate Rhox.

card.name: Rising Waters
card.text: Lands don't untap during their controllers' untap steps. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player untaps a land he or she controls.

card.name: Rootwater Thief
card.text: {U}: Rootwater Thief gains flying until end of turn. Whenever Rootwater Thief deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}. If you do, search that player's library for a card and exile it, then the player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Rupture
card.text: Sacrifice a creature. Rupture deals damage equal to that creature's power to each creature without flying and each player.

card.name: Rusting Golem
card.text: Fading 5 Rusting Golem's power and toughness are each equal to the number of fade counters on it.

card.name: Saproling Burst
card.text: Fading 7 Remove a fade counter from Saproling Burst: Put a green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of fade counters on Saproling Burst." When Saproling Burst leaves the battlefield, destroy all tokens put onto the battlefield with Saproling Burst. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Saproling Cluster
card.text: {1}, Discard a card: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Seal of Strength

card.name: Silkenfist Order
card.text: Whenever Silkenfist Order becomes blocked, untap it.

card.name: Sivvi's Ruse
card.text: If an opponent controls a Mountain and you control a Plains, you may cast Sivvi's Ruse without paying its mana cost. Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn to creatures you control.

card.name: Sivvi's Valor
card.text: If you control a Plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control rather than pay Sivvi's Valor's mana cost. All damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn is dealt to you instead.

card.text: When Skyshroud Sentinel enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Skyshroud Sentinel, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.text: {3}{U}: Return Sliptide Serpent to its owner's hand.

card.text: Sneaky Homunculus can't block or be blocked by creatures with power 2 or greater.

card.name: Spineless Thug
card.text: Spineless Thug can't block.

card.name: Spiritual Asylum
card.text: Creatures and lands you control have shroud. When a creature you control attacks, sacrifice Spiritual Asylum.

card.name: Spiteful Bully
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Spiteful Bully deals 3 damage to target creature you control.

card.name: Stampede Driver
card.text: {1}{G}, {T}, Discard a card: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Stronghold Biologist
card.text: {U}{U}, {T}, Discard a card: Counter target creature spell.

card.name: Stronghold Discipline
card.text: Each player loses 1 life for each creature he or she controls.

card.name: Stronghold Gambit
card.text: Each player chooses a card in his or her hand. Then each player reveals his or her chosen card. The owner of each creature card revealed this way with the lowest converted mana cost puts it onto the battlefield.

card.name: Stronghold Machinist
card.text: {U}{U}, {T}, Discard a card: Counter target noncreature spell.

card.name: Stronghold Zeppelin
card.text: Flying Stronghold Zeppelin can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Submerge
card.text: If an opponent controls a Forest and you control an Island, you may cast Submerge without paying its mana cost. Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Tangle Wire
card.text: Fading 4 At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player taps an untapped artifact, creature, or land he or she controls for each fade counter on Tangle Wire.

card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}: You may put a basic land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Topple

card.text: Vicious Hunger deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.
